Before you can take your first assignment on KUDO, you must SIGN UP as an interpreter. Please click on the button below to sign up and create an account.

A few important guidelines:
  • Interpreters must have completed the Interpreter Journey, KUDO’s online onboarding training for interpreters.
  • You must connect via computer on Google Chrome or Firefox.
  • You must use a USB headset for clear audio and speech distribution.
  • A good internet connection is needed for the best experience.
 

Have a great meeting!
